entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the twins and is mentioned as seizing the envelope in Ron's other hand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as having an envelope in his hand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned as seeing something scarlet and gold fall into George's palm.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twins and is mentioned as snatching the letter out of Ron's grasp.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is bound to pick Harry.

relationships.description: George seized the envelope in Ron's other hand.
Fred snatched the letter out of Ron's grasp.
George is indignantly talking about Harry being a prefect.
Fred is also indignantly talking about Harry being a prefect.
Dumbledore is bound to pick Harry as a prefect.
